Class RequestHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.example.bookflow.RequestHolder

  • public class RequestHolder
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
    Request holder class handles displaying of details for items in the request lists
